author: micah
text: i just learned about oplan sagittarius today....

author: micah
text: also, asking questions is fine! asking for other people's opinion is fun. it's nice to hear different insights from different people.

author: micah
text: i learned on my own pace. kasi learning doesn't happen overnight, it's a process. so wag mong biglain yung sarili mo, one issue at a time lang.

author: micah
text: i educated myself by following people who has the same sentiments as mine, then by reading articles and blogs para mas maintindihan ko. grade 9 is also yung start na naging vocal ako sa pagsasalita against duterte admin.

author: micah
text: ang funny kasi when i reached grade 10, tatlong political issue lang alam ko. grade 8 i learned abt ejk. grade 9 i learned abt feminism. grade 10 i learned abt martial law.

author: micah
text: i started here on twitter. i actually read a lot of tweets with the hashtag #.JusticeForKian, i even reposted some on my own facebook account hahaha. nung una, i was just reading it. later on, pinilit kong intindihin bakit galit sila at ano bang mali sa war on drugs.

author: micah
text: the first issue i learned was the extrajudicial killings ng war on drugs. gaya ng sabi ko, si kian delos santos ang wake up call ko.

author: micah
text: una, i followed a lot of activists' twitter accs sa personal acc ko. if you guys know chad booc, (i hope he's in a better place now), he's one of the people i followed here. he's a lumad teacher, and i honestly loved his tweets re: socio-political issues.
